review_title: The best hospital that I ever worked-excellent quality outcomes
job_title: Registered Nurse in Camp Hill, PA
pros: Mission driven and relationship-based. Holy Spirit is focused on putting patients first. This has been my favorite hospital that I ever worked.  My colleagues are the best workgroup I ever experienced.
cons: Healthcare reform and competition in the marketplace make healthcare a difficult business for all hospitals.  We all have to learn to do more with less payment.

review_title: Ten years and still generally enjoying working here...
pros: Great training opportunities, competitive wages for the region. Upper management is built and runs upon Catholic values, and a generally caring atmosphere is created for the patients.
cons: Middle management breaks everyone into cliques, and this tends to break everyone into small work groups which often become abusive of one another.

review_title: I like the people I work with

3)  50% off of bill for employee who uses services at HSH
cons: Some times it seems that the nursing leadership is all about the publicity and how the nurses feel are secondary

pros: Good pay, good PTO make for a steady life.
